share your personal web

On the search to find the right X, we google, we search twitter, reddit, we follow people and accounts. People know a lot about connections between items. This is not reflected in the structure of the web.

We add this social dimension to any website. Starting with simple comment boxes.

Enabling anyone to bookmark content and follow content creators. And reward good content and disadvantage bad content. why || user, community needs || problems || goals text text
